title: T206 raw HOFs for sale- ALL SOLD, THANKS!!
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: T206 raw HOFs for sale- ALL SOLD, THANKS!!
posts.post_content:
I am trying to put some money together to buy a card or two, so I am looking to sell a couple here.  As always, discounts if you buy it all at once, as I hate going to the post office more than anyone else in the world!!!  I will dig deeper as they sell.
Thanks as always,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

T206 Keeler Old Mill-  $175  (SOLDDD!!!)
T206 Crawford P350- $120  (SOLDDD!!!)
T206 Eddie Collins SC 350,30- $60  (SOLDDD!!!)
